definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[שִׁגּיוֹן]] doubtful word, Ps 7:1 (title), Ew De al. from √[[שׁגה]] go a stray, reel, i.e. wild, passionate song, with rapid changes of rhythm; cf. Lag:BN 201f. who cp. [[שִׁגׇּעוֹן]], √[[שׁגע]]; LXX yalmo)v, rd. prob. [[מִזְמוֹר]]; pl. [[שִׁגְיׁנוֹת]] Hb Hab 3:1 (title), rd. [[נְגִינוֹת]], so LXX.
